name: Nobody's Escape Plan
description:
A first-person survival horror game made for Themed Horror Game Jam #7.

After a flood, monsters appear in your town. Find supplies, survive and escape.

Controls MovementW A S DJumpSpacePick up itemFUse itemLeft Mouse Button
Throw itemRight Mouse ButtonSelect item1 2 3 4 Credits
